channel.title: Telluride 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Telluride 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Springsteen: Deliver Me From Nowhere’ Review: Jeremy Allen White Gives Raw, Internalized Performance as The Boss in Contemplative Bio-Drama
item.description: Jeremy Strong, Stephen Graham and Odessa Young also star in Scott Cooper’s examination of the brutal comedown after a blockbuster tour, which yielded the musician’s most personal album.

item.title: ‘Springsteen: Deliver Me From Nowhere’ Review: Jeremy Allen White Gives Raw, Internalized Performance as The Boss in Contemplative Bio-Drama
item.description: Jeremy Strong, Stephen Graham and Odessa Young also star in Scott Cooper’s examination of the brutal comedown after a blockbuster tour, which yielded the musician’s most personal album.

item.title: Telluride: Jafar Panahi on Hand, George Clooney Not, as Fest Kicks Off with Patrons Brunch and ‘La Grazia’ Preview
item.description: The fest also confirmed that Bruce Springsteen will be at the fest in support of ‘Springsteen: Deliver Me from Nowhere,’ Scott Cooper’s narrative film starring Jeremy Allen White.

item.title: Telluride: Jafar Panahi on Hand, George Clooney Not, as Fest Kicks Off with Patrons Brunch and ‘La Grazia’ Preview
item.description: The fest also confirmed that Bruce Springsteen will be at the fest in support of ‘Springsteen: Deliver Me from Nowhere,’ Scott Cooper’s narrative film starring Jeremy Allen White.

item.title: ‘Highway 99: A Double Album’ Review: Ethan Hawke Pays Tribute to Merle Haggard With a Rousing and Soulful Pilgrimage Through His Songs
item.description: The director gathers a who’s who of musicians for performances and conversation about the country luminary.

item.title: ‘Highway 99: A Double Album’ Review: Ethan Hawke Pays Tribute to Merle Haggard With a Rousing and Soulful Pilgrimage Through His Songs
item.description: The director gathers a who’s who of musicians for performances and conversation about the country luminary.

item.title: Telluride: Richard Linklater on ‘Nouvelle Vague,’ Selling It to Netflix and France’s Oscar Choice
item.description: The veteran filmmaker, whose ‘Blue Moon’ is also playing at this year’s fest, weighs in on Trump’s threatened tariffs on films made outside of the U.S., the status of his 20-year ‘Merrily We Roll Alon

item.title: Telluride: Netflix Acquires Doc Short ‘All the Empty Rooms’ (Exclusive)
item.description: Oscar nominee Joshua Seftel’s powerful 33-minute film chronicles a seven-year quest to memorialize the bedrooms of children killed in school shootings.

item.title: Telluride: Netflix Acquires Doc Short ‘All the Empty Rooms’ (Exclusive)
